Valluri Kameswar Rao (born 7 August 1965) is an Indian judge currently serving on the Delhi High Court. He was also served as the judge of Karnataka High court from 1 June 2024 to 29 May 2025 where he also served as Acting Chief Justice from 29 May 2025, until his repatriation to Delhi High Court.
